divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and i were outside in are front yard on oct 22 2011 at 930pm.when we saw several lets call them crafts flying directly above us. the best way to describe it is looked like a fleet of triangular ships that were different sizes.they were heading in a straight line east to west.5 or 6 small 4 or 5 medium and one massive triangle (the mothership)was at the end of the convoy.the smaller craft were flying like geese heading south at fist,but then they broke off in different directions fast then they formed a tight triangle.they did this a couple times. always heading due west.the med triangles followed then the BIG one behind them.my feelings at the time were stay focused and remember.i lost site when they reached lake michigan shoreline then they just seemed to fade away.there was not a cloud in the sky that night.we saw them CLEARLY....
